#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
//#include<conio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
struct node
{
       ll l;
       ll lo;
       ll val;
       };
       
       int main()
       {
           int t;
           cin>>t;
           while(t--)
           {
           
           string ss;
         cin>>ss;
           
           ll n=ss.length();
           node s[n+1];
           for(int i=0;i<=n;i++)
           {s[i].l=0;
           s[i].lo=0;
           s[i].val=0;
           
                   
                   
                   
                   }
           
           if(ss[0]=='L')
           s[0].l=1;
           
           
           
           for(ll i=1;i<n;i++)
           {
                   if(ss[i]=='L')
                   {
                                s[i].l=s[i].l+s[i-1].l+1;
                                s[i].val=s[i-1].lo;
                                
                                s[i].lo=s[i-1].lo;
                                
                                
                                }
                                else
                                {s[i].l=s[i-1].l;
                                    s[i].lo=s[i-1].lo+s[i-1].l;
                                    
                                    
                                    
                                    
                                    }
                   
                   
                   s[i].val=s[i].val+s[i-1].val;
                   
                   }
           
           
          printf("%lld\n",s[n-1].val);
           
           } 
           
           
          
           return 0;
           
           
           }
